name: Rubber Duckie - Flappy Bathtub Adventure
description:
Spikes, Pipes, Bubbles, oh my! Help Rubber Duckie on his retro bathtub adventure on his quest to collect the golden stars in this simple yet addictive game.

With simple tap and drag controls you flap rubber duckie's little yellow wings to avoid obstacles on his quest.

Three different game modes, each with its own play style, provide the ultimate challenge for your finger, reflexes, and wits.

With funny sound effects and retro style graphics, you will surely find Rubber Duckie Bathtub Adventure your favorite pick up and play addiction.

So download now, and help your old time yellow friend grab as many stars as his little beak can carry.

And did we mention there are bubbles? Lots of bubbles!

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

By janstanyc - Version 1.0 - Mar 5, 2014 (iTunes Review)
***** (5-Star) Better than Flappy Bird !
